name: Lavalley Aviation
about: LaValley Aviation, located at the Potsdam Municipal Airport in Potsdam, NY, is a comprehensive aviation training facility dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their dreams. Led by Chief Flight Instructor Kurt Thomas, an airline pilot with over a decade of experience, our team of professional instructors offers a range of training programs including Sport Pilot, Private Pilot, Instrument, Multi-Engine, Commercial, and Sea Plane certifications. In addition to flight training, we provide services in aircraft maintenance, scenic flights, aerial photography, aircraft management, and aircraft sales and acquisition. Our state-of-the-art online scheduling system allows students to manage their flight lessons efficiently. At LaValley Aviation, we are committed to providing top-notch instruction and support to ensure our students succeed in their aviation careers. Contact us today to schedule a discovery flight and take the first step towards your aviation goals.
